Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package dcos-cli for versions less than 1.2.0-16
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-28180 affecting package dcos-cli for versions less than 1.2.0-16. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package dcos-cli is earlier than 1.2.0-16, affected by CVE-2024-28180
